item.description: Come join us after work and relax with old and new friends.  There will be live jazz at 9 pm.  There is no charge.  For info, call Gail 860-582-8229.  Directions to 136 Main Street:  I‑84 to 72E, take Exit 9 Main Street, ramp top turn right, at next light turn right onto Chestnut Street, at next light turn right onto Main Street, facility across street on left.  Free parking on street after 5 pm.
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be inside waiting for you in the lounge's alcove.

group.who: Come join us for a FUN time!
group.name: Singles Social Connections

item.name: Singles Happy Hour
